snippet: After a trying year with medical issues and a French Open upset, the four-time Wimbledon champion has kicked into a familiar gear on the grass.
abstract: Christopher Clarey On Tennis column holds that after a trying year with medical issues and a French Open upset, four-time Wimbledon champion Serena Williams has kicked into a familiar gear on the grass.
lead_paragraph: After a trying year with medical issues and a French Open upset, the four-time Wimbledon champion has kicked into a familiar gear on the grass.

headline.main: With Renewed Confidence, Serena Williams Looks to Win Now
